itunes:title: Episode 763 - Jeff Bezos Steps Down From Amazon
title: Episode 763 - Jeff Bezos Steps Down From Amazon
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the latest STONK news about Robinhood and the GameStop and AMC stocks, Dan rails against GOP lawmakers who are more concerned with telling him who he can’t vote for with impeachment than running the country, and...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the latest STONK news about Robinhood and the GameStop and AMC stocks, Dan rails against GOP lawmakers who are more concerned with telling him who he can’t vote for with impeachment than running the country, and Dan explains why he respects Tulsi Gabbard but hates most politicians regardless of their side — plus Dan explains how close to being screwed the U.S. economy is.
